data.lyric:
[ti:OK Not To Be OK]
[ar:Marshmello/Demi Lovato]
[al:OK Not To Be OK]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]OK Not To Be OK - Marshmello (棉花糖)/Demi Lovato (黛米·洛瓦托)
[00:03.01]Lyrics by：Marshmello/Demi Lovato/Gregory Hein/James Gutch/James Nicholas Bailey
[00:06.03]Composed by：Marshmello/Demi Lovato/Gregory Hein/James Gutch/James Nicholas Bailey
[00:09.05]Feeling like a drop in the ocean
[00:11.66]That don't nobody notice
[00:13.24]
[00:14.29]Maybe it's all just in your head
[00:18.32]Feeling like you're trapped in your own skin
[00:21.17]And now your body's frozen
[00:23.66]Broken down you've got nothing left
[00:27.73]When you're high on emotion
[00:30.14]And you're losing your focus
[00:32.22]And you feel too exhausted to pray
[00:35.62]
[00:37.06]Don't get lost in the moment
[00:39.19]Or give up when you're closest
[00:41.49]All you need is somebody to say
[00:45.51]It's okay not to be okay
[00:50.19]It's okay not to be okay
[00:54.83]When you're down and you feel ashamed
[00:59.53]It's okay not to be okay
[01:04.95]Feeling like your life's an illusion
[01:06.73]
[01:07.76]And lately you're secluded
[01:09.99]Thinking you'll never get your chancе
[01:13.14]
[01:14.03]Feeling like you got no solution
[01:16.18]
[01:17.04]It's only 'cause you're human
[01:19.45]No control it's out of your hands
[01:23.69]When you're high on emotion
[01:25.86]And you're losing your focus
[01:28.17]And you feel too exhausted to pray
[01:31.46]
[01:32.92]Don't get lost in the moment
[01:35.08]Or give up when you're closest
[01:37.23]All you need is somebody to say
[01:41.41]It's okay not to be okay
[01:46.04]It's okay not to be okay
[01:50.73]When you're down and you feel ashamed
[01:55.39]It's okay not to be okay
[02:01.12]When you're high on emotion
[02:03.09]And you're losing your focus
[02:05.48]And you feel too exhausted to pray
[02:08.74]
[02:10.36]Aah
[02:10.53]Don't get lost in the moment
[02:12.32]Or give up when you're closest
[02:14.58]All you need is somebody to say
[02:18.74]It's okay not to be okay
[02:23.40]Ooh
[02:23.57]It's okay not to be okay
[02:26.69]No no no
[02:27.90]When you're down and you feel ashamed
[02:30.48]When you feel ashamed
[02:32.75]It's okay not to be okay
[02:35.19]No no no
[02:36.77]
[02:37.33]It's okay not to be okay
data.trans:
[ti:OK Not To Be OK]
[ar:Marshmello/Demi Lovato]
[al:OK Not To Be OK]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.01]//
[00:06.03]//
[00:09.05]感觉就像沧海一粟
[00:11.66]无人关注
[00:13.24]
[00:14.29]也许都是你想太多
[00:18.32]感觉你被自己禁锢
[00:21.17]现在你已动弹不得
[00:23.66]崩溃至极 你已一无所有
[00:27.73]当你情绪高涨时
[00:30.14]精神无法集中时
[00:32.22]疲惫到祈祷的力气都没有时
[00:35.62]
[00:37.06]不要迷失在那一刻
[00:39.19]无论如何也不要放弃
[00:41.49]你需要的只是一个人对你说
[00:45.51]没事的 不好也没关系
[00:50.19]没事的 不好也没关系
[00:54.83]当你失落时 感到羞愧时
[00:59.53]没事的 不好也没关系
[01:04.95]感觉你的人生就是一种错觉
[01:06.73]
[01:07.76]最近你与世隔绝
[01:09.99]感觉你永远不会有机会
[01:13.14]
[01:14.03]感觉你找不到解决问题的方法
[01:16.18]
[01:17.04]只是因为你是个凡人
[01:19.45]一切都是你无法掌控的
[01:23.69]当你情绪高涨时
[01:25.86]精神无法集中时
[01:28.17]疲惫到祈祷的力气都没有时
[01:31.46]
[01:32.92]不要迷失在那一刻
[01:35.08]无论如何也不要放弃
[01:37.23]你需要的只是一个人对你说
[01:41.41]没事的 不好也没关系
[01:46.04]没事的 不好也没关系

[01:55.39]没事的 不好也没关系
